title: Learning Lucie style
creator_credit: Elizabeth Creese, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Being born with cerebral palsy has forced Lucie to learn things in different ways to other children. In turn, she has proven to be a great teacher to Elizabeth Creese and her family.
creator_credit_for_label: Elizabeth Creese, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
